mapper.insert:
insert into fw_plan_injection_molding
id, product_id, customer_id, plan_count, product_devices_id, mould_id, start_time, priority, product_code, material, product_time, deliver_time, note, status, update_user,
actual_start, actual_end, product_device_code, create_user, create_time,
#{id}, #{productId}, #{customerId}, #{planCount}, #{productDevicesId}, #{mouldId}, #{startTime}, #{priority}, #{productCode}, #{material}, #{productTime}, #{deliverTime}, #{note}, #{status}, #{updateUser},
#{actualStart}, #{actualEnd}, #{productDeviceCode}, #{createUser}, #{createTime},
mapper.update:
update fw_plan_injection_molding
product_id= #{productId}, customer_id= #{customerId}, plan_count= #{planCount}, product_devices_id= #{productDevicesId}, product_count= #{productCount}, mould_id= #{mouldId}, start_time= #{startTime}, priority= #{priority}, product_code= #{productCode}, material= #{material}, product_time = #{productTime}, deliver_time= #{deliverTime}, note= #{note}, status = #{status}, update_user= #{updateUser}, update_time= #{updateTime},
actual_start = #{actualStart}, actual_end = #{actualEnd}, product_device_code = #{productDeviceCode}, create_user = #{createUser}, create_time = #{createTime},
where id = #{id}
update fw_plan_injection_molding set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
update fw_plan_injection_molding set status = #{status} where id = #{id}

update.foreach: update fw_plan_injection_molding set start_time = #{im.startTime} where id = #{im.id}

mapper.select:
select p.*,l.code parts_code,l.name parts_name,l.unit,c.name customer_name, (select sum(stop_time) from fw_plan_injection_stop_list where injection_id=p.id) stop_time, date_add(start_time,INTERVAL product_time MINUTE) end_time from fw_plan_injection_molding p left join fw_logistics_product l on p.product_id=l.id left join fw_plan_customer c on p.customer_id=c.id where 1=1
and p.product_devices_id like concat('%/', #{productDevicesId}, '%') ESCAPE '/'
and p.product_code like concat('%/', #{productCode}, '%') ESCAPE '/'
and l.code like concat('%/', #{partsCode}, '%') ESCAPE '/'
and date_format(p.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >=#{startTime}
and date_format(p.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <=#{endTime}
and p.status in (0,1,2,3)
and p.status in (${status})
order by p.start_time asc
select sum(stop_time) from fw_plan_injection_stop_list where injection_id=#{injectionId}
select * from fw_plan_injection_molding where mould_id = #{mouldId} and status in (0,1,2) order by start_time desc limit 0,1

select fpim.*,fmd.cavity from fw_plan_injection_molding fpim left join fw_mould_devices fmd on fpim.mould_id = fmd.id where fpim.product_devices_id = #{deviceId} and fpim.status in (0,1,2) order by fpim.start_time desc limit 0,1
select fpim.*,fmd.cavity from fw_plan_injection_molding fpim left join fw_mould_devices fmd on fpim.mould_id = fmd.id where fpim.id = #{id}

select fpim.*,fmd.cavity,flp.code parts_code,flp.name parts_name,flp.unit from fw_plan_injection_molding fpim left join fw_mould_devices fmd on fpim.mould_id = fmd.id left join fw_logistics_product flp on fpim.product_id = flp.id where fpim.product_devices_id = #{deviceId} and fpim.status=1 order by fpim.start_time desc limit 0,1

select fpim.*,fmd.cavity,flp.code parts_code,flp.name parts_name,flp.unit from fw_plan_injection_molding fpim left join fw_mould_devices fmd on fpim.mould_id = fmd.id left join fw_logistics_product flp on fpim.product_id = flp.id where fpim.product_devices_id = #{deviceId} and fpim.status in(0,1,2) order by fpim.start_time desc limit 0,1

SELECT t2.id AS mouldId, t2.NAME AS mouldName, t2.CODE AS mouldCode , t4.create_time, t4.create_user FROM fw_plan_injection_molding t1 LEFT JOIN fw_mould_devices t2 ON t1.mould_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT max(id) id,mould_devices_id from fw_mould_use_record mould_devices_id GROUP BY mould_devices_id ) t3 on t3.mould_devices_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN fw_mould_use_record t4 on t4.id = t3.id and t4.opreate = 0 and t4.task_status = 1 WHERE t1.product_code = #{productCode}

SELECT fpim.*,CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM fw_mould_house fmh WHERE fmh.injection_molding_id = fpim.id ) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS checked FROM fw_plan_injection_molding fpim WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,NOW(),fpim.start_time) <= 24*60 and fpim.status in (0);
